Sarge starts laughing.

Sarge: I'll make sure to get you 2 in, I like your =
styles. So, are you any good at fighting?...

  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, June 1=
6, 2001 1:19 AM
  Subject: Re: Sarge...


  BIRDBOT / PAPERTRON





  Pape=
rtron: Well, I'm a stinky chameleon. Erf fer fer fer! Trespassing? I don't =
know what that is but I've been trying to get those peoples attention. I wa=
nt to live there.



  (Birdbot looks at Sarge and stands up straight.)



=
  Birdbot: RY! All I want is what everyone else is eating! RY! Nothing is w=
rong with me accept I hate people when they don't leave me alone! And I hat=
e whiney crying people and laughing people. I want to join this guys too bu=
t they keep ignoring us. Do you know one of their names so I can call them =
out here?....
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
=
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, June 16, 2001 12:42 AM
=
    Subject: Re: Sarge...


    Burning Hammer comes out of the CR Chamber =
to hear Trinity scream and he runs to her position. Meanwhile, outside.

  =
  Sarge: Hey, who are you 2? You wouldn't happen to be trespassing, would y=
ou?

    Sarge walks in front of Papertron and looks at him.

    Sarge: Wh=
at are you?

    He looks at Birdbot.

    Sarge: And what's wrong with you=
?...
